info.name: YouTube Dark 2012 - Fixed for 7th Dec
info.description: A dark version of YouTube attempting to replicate the dark theme they applied for one day on the 31st March 2012. It is mostly greys, blacks and reds. I have also labeled as much of the code as I could, so it is easily modified if it isn't quite your cup of tea.
info.additionalInfo:
Updated 05/04/2012 to fix header div change.
Updated 06/04/2012 to fix a mouse over problem, improved visuals a little (shadows, gradiants and removed some poorly colored borders, fixed problem with time being unreadable in main video window.

New image showing changes coming soon.

Updated 07/12/2012 to fix the new site layout and css, not perfect but good interim.
Updated 12:30pm fixed a few more bits, still working on getting the background to look correct. I will attempt to improve visuals and remove redundant styles in the near future.

Updated 19:00 Fixed a lot of elements, improved button visibility, removed nasty white borders. Much nicer looking now but still needs a little work. I will post new pictures in the near future.

Updated 20:00 Fixed the front page borders and the signed out front page, also fixed the alignment on the top buttons and uploaded new pictures.
